name.japanese: インペルダウン - レベル4（焦熱地獄）

description: Level 4 of Impel Down, known as Blazing Hell. A scorching hot level with a pool of boiling blood and intense heat that makes it nearly unbearable for prisoners and visitors alike.

keyEvents.title: Luffy vs. Magellan Battle
keyEvents.description: Chief Warden Magellan confronts Luffy on Level 4, leading to an intense battle.
keyEvents.significance: The location of one of Luffy's most dangerous battles in Impel Down.

keyEvents.title: Bridge Sections Melt
keyEvents.description: Magellan's poison melts sections of the bridge on Level 4, showing the corrosive power of his abilities.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates that even Impel Down's infrastructure is vulnerable to Magellan's poison.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Lands Jet Bazooka
keyEvents.description: Luffy successfully hits Magellan with Jet Bazooka on Level 4.
keyEvents.significance: First successful attack on Magellan, but results in Luffy being poisoned.

statusHistory.reason: Level 4 remains operational despite damage from poison

name.japanese: インペルダウン - レベル3（飢餓地獄）

description: Level 3 of Impel Down, known as Starvation Hell. Prisoners on this level receive very little food and water, slowly wasting away.

keyEvents.title: Hannyabal's Offer
keyEvents.description: Hannyabal encounters Buggy and Mr. 3 on Level 3 and offers them safe passage.
keyEvents.significance: Shows Hannyabal's ambition and willingness to compromise duty for personal gain.

keyEvents.title: Hannyabal Defeats Buggy and Mr. 3
keyEvents.description: Hannyabal easily defeats both Buggy and Mr. 3 on Level 3.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes Hannyabal as a formidable fighter despite his comedic appearance.
